Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute at 47th/Red Line
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, St.Lawrence, 47th, and Cottage Grove due to, police activity near 47th/Red Line.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 51st, St.Lawrence, 47th, and Cottage Grove due to, police activity near 47th/Red Line.

Allow extra travel time.
